backend/main.mo: Main Motoko canister defining admin access control, storage mixins, and numerous domain maps and counters for users, products, orders, artifacts, and related backend entities.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two Contact page social-media interaction features to their associated source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of prewritten summaries describing various frontend pages, hooks, components, and documentation files for build planning.
frontend/docs/data-architecture.md: Explains authentication, role model, first-admin bootstrap, and frontend data persistence strategy using React Query.
frontend/docs/design-direction.md: Design guidelines defining the dark‑fantasy theme, including colors, typography, spacing, components, and interaction states.
frontend/docs/local-storage-strategy.md: Describes local storage categories, canister‑backed data models, offline mutation handling, and logout behavior.
frontend/docs/phase1-features-by-page.md: Lists Phase 1 and future planned features for each site page, outlining structure and upcoming enhancements.
frontend/docs/phase1-planning.md: Outlines site architecture, page list, navigation, access levels, and phase‑1 scope for the dark‑fantasy web app.
frontend/docs/phase6-qa-test-plan.md: Provides detailed manual QA test cases for authentication, role access, shop flows, and multi‑device testing.
Describes the iteration workflow, offline‑first feedback system, admin review flow, and update checklist.
frontend/docs/production-deployment.md: Covers backend and frontend deployment steps for IC, Vercel, and Netlify, including env configuration.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and CSS variables for light/dark themes and component styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template loading the SPA root and main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up React Router routes, lazy‑loaded pages, query client config, and global layout for the app.
frontend/src/components/about/TeamSectio: Renders a team member grid with flip-card effects, showing basic info on the front and bios with expertise on the back.
frontend/src/components/about/TimelineSe: Displays a vertical timeline of company milestones using stylized cards and icons.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminAcces: Provides a form to view the masked admin code and update it with validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminAnaly: Simple wrapper tab that renders the analytics snapshot section.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminCoupo: Manages coupon creation, validity toggling, customer delivery, and listing with validation and refetching.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminFeedb: Shows all user feedback with search and category filters, handling loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminMessa: Allows admins to send messages to customers and view inbox items with validation and refresh controls.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminOrder: Displays all orders with filters and opens a detail modal for tracking management.
Modal for viewing and modifying an order's tracking status, location updates, and customer-facing notes using mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminPermi: Checks admin permissions before rendering children, showing loading or access-denied states when appropriate.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminProdu: Lists products with search filtering, loading and error states, and an option to add new products.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminReque: Modal for reviewing a custom request and performing actions such as approving, declining, messaging, sending coupons, or converting to an order.
Shows a searchable list of custom requests and loads detailed request info into a modal.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminSyste: Renders the system settings dashboard, fetching and refreshing health, access logs, login attempts, events, and activity logs, and includes several admin control sections.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminTesti: Displays and filters user testimonies, allowing admins to approve entries and view details including ratings and media indicators.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminUsers: Lists registered admins with filtering by principal and displays roles and permissions, handling loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/admin/BackupReco: Manages system backup creation, restoration, and metadata display with refresh and confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/components/admin/MessageAtt: Allows admins to upload and manage message attachments with progress tracking, size validation, and removal controls.
frontend/src/components/adminDashboard/A: Provides the layout shell for the admin dashboard, including top bar, sidebar navigation, and content area.
Sidebar navigation component listing dashboard sections, handling active highlighting and logout redirection.
Top bar showing quick-create menu, notifications count, and profile button, with section navigation helpers.
frontend/src/components/adminDashboard/v: Dashboard home view displaying quick actions and basic product and testimony stats with loading and error states.
Portfolio upload form allowing image/video selection, metadata input, validation, and simulated upload handling.
Security settings UI for viewing masked access code, updating the admin code, and viewing logs with validation and errors.
frontend/src/components/adminplus/AdminP: Admin password reset form for setting passwords by principal ID with validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/adminplus/AdminR: Lists admins, supports promoting/demoting them, and toggling their permissions with loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/adminplus/Advanc: Provides shop-wide controls including enabling/disabling the store, overriding product prices, and toggling product visibility.
frontend/src/components/adminplus/Analyt: Fetches and displays a snapshot of site analytics with refresh support and loading placeholders.
frontend/src/components/adminplus/Coupon: Manages the global coupon enable/disable switch and shows current coupon system status.
frontend/src/components/adminplus/Portfo: Empty file placeholder for future portfolio management UI.
frontend/src/components/adminplus/QuoteR: Empty file placeholder for future quote request management UI.
frontend/src/components/adminplus/Testim: Empty file placeholder for future testimony management UI.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Button that handles Internet Identity login/logout and clears cached data on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal form prompting new users to enter and save their name and email before continuing.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAdmi: Gatekeeper component that checks authentication and admin role before rendering protected content.
Checks if admin access is unlocked and redirects to /admin-access if not; otherwise renders children.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Requires Internet Identity login before showing children, displaying loading and login prompts as needed.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireOwne: Ensures the user is authenticated and the contract owner, showing loading, login, or access‑denied states accordingly.
frontend/src/components/contact/ContactP: Displays a styled accordion FAQ list with preset questions and answers.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/OrderT: Renders detailed order tracking info including status, next status, notes, and location updates.
frontend/src/components/effects/FadeInSe: Animates content into view using an intersection observer with reduced-motion support.
frontend/src/components/effects/FlipCard: Interactive flip-card component that toggles front and back views with optional reduced-motion behavior.
frontend/src/components/effects/Parallax: Applies a parallax scroll effect using requestAnimationFrame with reduced-motion handling.
frontend/src/components/home/Announcemen: Displays a list of announcements with badges, dates, and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/home/FeaturedCar: Carousel showcasing featured items with navigation controls and detail links.
frontend/src/components/home/QuickLinksG: Grid of navigation cards linking to major site sections with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the main app layout with background layers, header, footer, analytics, and a slot for routed page content plus random quotes.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders the site footer with about text, navigation links, legal links, and a bottom bar with attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/HeaderNav: Implements the responsive site header with navigation links, admin visibility logic, authentication actions, and mobile menu handling.
frontend/src/components/layout/PageLayou: Provides a simple page wrapper that optionally displays a title and description above page content.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Portfo: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/quotes/RandomQuo: Fetches and displays a few random quotes in styled cards on each page load.
frontend/src/components/requests/Request: Allows users to upload, validate, preview, and remove image or video files, tracking progress and returning media items.
frontend/src/components/services/Service: Displays a list of service offerings in an accordion format, each with icons, summaries, details, and features.
frontend/src/components/shop/ProductDeta: Modal showing product details, pricing, stock info, images, availability, and an option to add the item to the cart.
frontend/src/components/shop/ProductFlip: Displays a product as a flippable card with pricing, stock status, availability info, and a button to view details.
frontend/src/components/shop/ShopCartDra: Implements a cart drawer with product listing, coupon validation, order creation, and checkout logic.
frontend/src/components/shop/useShopFilt: Provides search, stock filtering, and sorting logic for a product list via React state and memoization.
frontend/src/components/system/Analytics: Tracks page views on initial load and route changes using a custom analytics function.
frontend/src/components/system/AppErrorB: A top-level error boundary that logs errors locally and shows a recovery UI with reload and troubleshooting options.
frontend/src/components/system/ErrorStat: Renders an error alert with offline detection and an optional retry button.
frontend/src/components/system/Troublesh: Displays locally stored error logs with options to view stack traces and clear the log.
frontend/src/components/testimonies/Crea: Dialog for submitting a testimony with rating, text, photos, videos, and validation before upload.
frontend/src/components/testimonies/Half: Interactive half-star rating input component with hover and click handling.
frontend/src/components/testimonies/Star: Displays a static star rating with support for half stars.
frontend/src/components/testimonies/Test: Flip-card media component showing image/video on front and description on back, with hover video playback.
Handles selecting, validating, previewing, and uploading photo/video testimony media items.
frontend/src/components/testimonies/useH: Hook that auto-plays or pauses a video based on hover and flip state.
frontend/src/data/quotes.ts: Exports a list of themed quotes used throughout the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminCoupons.ts: Provides admin coupon CRUD and mutation hooks using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminMessaging.ts: Hooks for fetching admin inbox messages and sending admin messages.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminNotifications: Fetches admin notification counts from the backend with periodic refetching.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackupRecovery.ts: Hooks for backup metadata retrieval, backup creation, and full data restore.
frontend/src/hooks/useGlobalErrorCapture: Registers global error handlers to log runtime and promise errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status flags. Wraps AuthClient creation with custom options and exposes related state through a hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useInView.ts: IntersectionObserver hook returning a ref and visibility state.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalCart.ts: Manages a local shopping cart stored in localStorage with add, remove, update, and summary helpers. Ensures bigint IDs are stringified and persists changes automatically.
frontend/src/hooks/useOfflineDrafts.ts: Stores, loads, and expires offline form drafts per formId in localStorage. Supports saving, retrieving, and clearing drafts with automatic expiry handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useOfflineMutationRep: Empty placeholder file for offline mutation replay functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnlineStatus.ts: Tracks browser online/offline status using navigator and window events. Returns a boolean indicating connectivity.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Detects the user's reduced-motion preference using matchMedia with cross-browser event listener support. Returns a boolean updated on preference changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps various backend calls with React Query, providing hooks for user profiles, roles, permissions, admin access, logs, and artifact-related queries. Integrates with useActor to call canister methods when available.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueuedMutations.ts: Empty placeholder file for queued mutation handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useRandomQuotes.ts: Returns 2–3 random quotes that update when the route changes. Uses memoization to provide stable quotes per page view.
frontend/src/hooks/useRecentlyViewed.ts: Manages a list of recently viewed products with timestamps, storing them in localStorage with expiry and size limits. Provides add and clear operations.
frontend/src/hooks/useSearchArtifacts.ts: Defines a React Query hook for artifact search; currently returns empty results until backend search is implemented. Uses query and category as query keys.
frontend/src/hooks/useSessionState.ts: Maintains session-scoped state persisted in localStorage with automatic session ID generation and expiry. Returns state with an updater that persists changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useSystemSettings.ts: Provides React Query hooks for system-level backend calls such as health checks, logs, events, and audit entries. Enables queries only when an actor is available.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes, fonts, utility classes, and animations.
frontend/src/lib/adminAccessSession.ts: Manages session-scoped admin access state using sessionStorage with functions to check, set, and clear it.
frontend/src/lib/adminEntryLockout.ts: Handles persistent admin lockout flags per principal using versioned localStorage utilities.
frontend/src/lib/analytics.ts: Provides first‑party and Google Analytics tracking with init, pageview, and event logging.
frontend/src/lib/authorizationErrors.ts: Normalizes authorization-related error messages and detects common authorization failure patterns.
frontend/src/lib/clientDetails.ts: Extracts browser user agent info and derives device type for logging and security use.
frontend/src/lib/errorLogging.ts: Implements local error log storage with read, write, clear, route detection, and message sanitization.
frontend/src/lib/localStorage.ts: Wrapper around localStorage adding versioning, expiry, safe reads/writes, and cleanup helpers.
frontend/src/lib/offlineMutationQueue.ts: Maintains a versioned queue of offline mutations with enqueue, retry, failure, and clearing operations.
frontend/src/lib/randomQuotes.ts: Selects 2–3 random non-repeating quotes from a predefined list.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider, then renders App.
frontend/src/pages/About.tsx: Renders an about page with styled sections describing the creator and their philosophy using cards and fade‑in effects.
frontend/src/pages/Admin.tsx: Implements the admin dashboard shell with section-based navigation and access gating for admins.
frontend/src/pages/AdminAccess.tsx: Provides the admin access code entry page with identity checks, lockout handling, and redirect on success.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPlus.tsx: Owner-only advanced admin panel offering analytics, shop controls, coupon management, admin registry, and password tools.
frontend/src/pages/BlogLore.tsx: Displays a list of lore-themed blog posts in a grid with category badges, dates, and excerpts.
frontend/src/pages/Contact.tsx: Contains a contact form with inputs, validation, simulated submission, and a FAQ section.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: User dashboard handling profile setup, fetching orders and products, and displaying order tracking. Includes profile form logic, refresh actions, and conditional rendering based on user state.
frontend/src/pages/FAQ.tsx: FAQ page with searchable, categorized accordion items. Filters questions based on user input and displays grouped FAQ content.
frontend/src/pages/Homepage.tsx: Homepage with hero section, featured artifacts carousel, quick links, and feature highlights. Uses parallax, animations, and navigation links to core site areas.
frontend/src/pages/Inbox.tsx: Inbox page fetching and displaying user messages with loading, error, and empty states. Supports marking messages as read and refreshing the inbox.
frontend/src/pages/Portfolio.tsx: Portfolio page with category filters and placeholder empty-state content. Currently uses static state with no backend integration yet.
frontend/src/pages/Privacy.tsx: Static privacy policy page outlining data collection, usage, security, rights, and contact information. Structured into sections with separators and headings.
frontend/src/pages/SearchArtifacts.tsx: Implements an artifact search page with keyword input, category filters, and results fetched from a custom search hook.
frontend/src/pages/Services.tsx: Displays service offerings with an accordion and provides links for submitting custom requests or contacting support.
frontend/src/pages/Shop.tsx: Renders the shop page with product listings, filters, cart handling, and conditional states for loading, errors, and shop availability.
frontend/src/pages/SubmitRequest.tsx: Provides a form for authenticated users to submit custom service requests with text fields and media uploads.
frontend/src/pages/Terms.tsx: Shows static terms of service content with multiple sections describing usage, liabilities, and policies.
frontend/src/pages/Testimonies.tsx: Displays customer testimonies with ratings, loading/error states, and a dialog for authenticated users to submit new testimonies.
frontend/src/types/adminMessaging.ts: Empty types file reserved for admin messaging definitions.
frontend/src/types/common.ts: Defines shared frontend types including product visibility, availability, and the Product interface.
frontend/src/types/orderTracking.ts: Defines order‑tracking types, status labels, history entries, fulfillment methods, and helpers for progressing statuses and formatting timestamps.
frontend/src/types/phase5a.ts: Provides types for media requests and testimonies, including media blobs, pricing preferences, and user-submitted content.
frontend/src/types/phase5b.ts: Contains request, inbox, and attachment types for Phase 5B, covering request details, statuses, summaries, and messaging items.
frontend/src/utils/mediaValidation.ts: Implements file, video, and description validation utilities plus helpers for size, duration formatting, and media type checks.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters for routing and state management.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme, colors, animations, fonts, and plugins for the frontend styling system.
project_state.json: Describes current project state, features, and pending requests related to social‑media bubble links on the Contact page.
